title: No RP at Level 5?
body: I am now level 10 and still have not received my 400 RP... Did they stop giving free RP?

replies.body: You get the hextech chest which (can) give you free champions, it starts by giving you a free skin or 2 and you can get a free ward.

Hey there,

Yep, there is no more RP reward for reaching level 3(?), It was replaced with a hextech starter chest with the introduction of hextech crafting.
oh , seems u didnot keep eye on the update . that was somewhere. Riot changed the prize into hextect or something. mean no more gift RP , and they reduce the starter runes tier 3 with 1 IP each
